synopsis.text: After winning his eighth gym badge, Ash and his friends Iris and Cilan are invited by Champion Cynthia to stay at her villa in eastern Unova before Ash competes in the Unova League. They meet up with Ash's old friend Dawn, who is also staying at the villa and wants to compete in the Pokemon World Championship junior competition. Over the next few months before the Unova League begins, the group befriends the mythical Pokemon Meloetta. However, the villainous Team Rocket also takes an interest in capturing Meloetta for an unknown scheme in the Unova region. As Ash prepares for his biggest battle yet, he and his friends must also work together to protect their new friend Meloetta.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
